sentences.sContent: During her life Elizabeth Barrett Browning conjectured that Browning would indulge in some "feeble bigamy" after her death.
sentences.sContent_eng: During her life Elizabeth Barrett Browning conjectured that Browning would indulge in some "feeble bigamy" after her death.
sentences.sCn: 伊丽莎白·巴雷特·勃朗宁在生时推测丈夫在她死后会陷入“虚弱的重婚罪”里。

sentences.sContent: But because a court in Liverpool also found him guilty of bigamy and fraud, with all the charges bundled together, his case provides an iffy precedent, if one at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: But because a court in Liverpool also found him guilty of bigamy and fraud, with all the charges bundled together, his case provides an iffy precedent, if one at all.
sentences.sCn: 该男子目前已被定罪，却是因为利物浦一法院还判定他犯有重婚和诈骗等罪行。 这一数罪并罚的案件提供了一个模棱两可的先例，如果也算是一个先例的话。

remMethod.val: bi (两) + gam (婚姻) + y → 重婚； 重婚罪

trans.tranOther: the crime of being married to two people at the same time
